title: Genetic switching by the Lac repressor is based on two-state Monod-Wyman-Changeux allostery.
authors: Romanuka J, Folkers GE, Gnida M, Kovačič L, Wienk H, Kaptein R, Boelens R
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
abstract: High-resolution NMR spectroscopy enabled us to characterize allosteric transitions between various functional states of the dimeric
